casebody.data:
Miriam BLANDINO and Fausto Mercedes, Individually and on Behalf of their Minor Children, Jared Mercedes and Yeriannis Mercedes
v.
Kendra PIERRE, John Doe, Geico Indemnity Company, USAgencies Casualty Insurance Company, Inc.- Liability and USAgencies Casualty Insurance Company, Inc.-UM NO. 2017-C-2093 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 9, 2018 Denied. GUIDRY, J., recused.
